summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting draft documents (RTC and verdict sheet) for a mock jury exercise. It indicates ongoing trial preparation work related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting draft trial documents for a mock jury exercise.

events.title: Mock Jury Exercise Preparation
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends draft documents (RTC and verdict sheet) to a team in preparation for a mock jury exercise.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: The prosecuting office handling the case.

locations.name: New York, New York 10007
locations.context: The address associated with the prosecutor's office.

keyFacts: Prosecutors in the Southern District of New York were preparing for a mock jury exercise as of September 2021.
The preparation involved drafting a 'RTC' (likely 'Request to Charge' or similar legal instruction) and a verdict sheet.
The email indicates active trial strategy work was ongoing years after Epstein's death, likely related to co-conspirator prosecutions.
